reportMetadata.title: PayroScore Technical Audit - Detailed Findings
reportMetadata.scope: Complete technical assessment across 5 audit phases

phase1.name: System Discovery & Inventory
phase1.findings: Comprehensive database schema with 72 tables, sophisticated architecture

phase2.name: Functional Testing & Verification
phase2.findings: Database integrity good, GraphQL API functional, authentication working

phase3.name: Integration & Data Flow Testing
phase3.findings: Performance excellent (41ms avg), some data consistency issues

phase4.name: Security & Compliance Audit
phase4.findings: CRITICAL FAILURES - 0/100 security score, 0/100 compliance score

phase5.name: Gap Analysis & Reporting
phase5.findings: SYSTEM INCOMPLETE - 93% of features missing, massive technical debt

security.dataExposure: Sensitive data exposure through role escalation
security.encryptionIssues: API endpoints using HTTP instead of HTTPS

compliance.auditLogging: MISSING - No comprehensive audit trail system
